programme.title: 20th Century Women
programme.desc: In Santa Barbara, Calif., a strong-willed but loving single mother (Annette Bening) raises her teenage son with the help of two unconventional young women (Elle Fanning, Greta Gerwig) during the summer of 1979.

programme.title: The Skulls
programme.desc: A freshman (Joshua Jackson) joins an elite society that will guarantee him success, but he questions his decision when his reporter roommate dies mysteriously.

programme.desc: Dark secrets intrude on the blossoming romance between a widowed merchant (Josh Duhamel) and a new arrival (Julianne Hough) in a small North Carolina town.
